title: TSMC supplies chips to Apple
description: TSMC is the sole foundry for Apple’s A- and M-series chips.

start.name: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.
start.description: Sole foundry for Apple’s A- and M-series chips.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company that heavily relies on TSMC for chip manufacturing.

title: Foxconn assembles iPhones
description: Foxconn assembles the majority of iPhones.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company that relies on Foxconn for iPhone assembly.

title: China hosts Apple’s assembly
description: China hosts >50% of Apple’s final assembly and a component base.

start.name: People’s Republic of China
start.description: Major assembly and component base for Apple products.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company that conducts major manufacturing in China.

title: Samsung supplies and competes
description: Samsung supplies OLED displays and is a main rival in smartphones.

start.name: Samsung Electronics
start.description: Supplier of OLED displays and a main rival in smartphones for Apple.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company that competes with Samsung and uses its displays.

title: Qualcomm supplies modem chips
description: Qualcomm provides 5G/4G modem chips for Apple.

start.name: Qualcomm
start.description: Provides modem chips for Apple until in-house development is ready.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company reliant on Qualcomm for modem chips.

title: U.S. & EU Regulators investigate Apple
description: Investigate App Store fees, search deal, self-preferencing.

start.name: U.S. & EU Antitrust Regulators
start.description: Investigate policies affecting Apple's services and ecosystem control.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company subject to antitrust investigations by regulators.

title: Global market influences Apple
description: iPhone ≈50% of Apple revenue; global demand impacts sales.

start.name: Global Smartphone Market Demand
start.description: Sector influencing Apple's revenue via demand cycles.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company whose revenue is impacted by global market demand.

title: Broadcom supplies RF chips
description: Supplies Wi-Fi/Bluetooth RF front-end chips to Apple.

start.name: Broadcom
start.description: Supplies RF front-end chips under multi-year contracts to Apple.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company reliant on Broadcom for RF chip supply.

title: India influences Apple’s diversification
description: Incentives and policies shape Apple’s diversification out of China.

start.name: India (Government & Manufacturing/Consumer Market)
start.description: Influences Apple's manufacturing and market strategies via incentives and demand.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company diversifying manufacturing strategy influenced by India.

title: Sony supplies imaging sensors
description: Exclusive supplier of high-end camera sensors to Apple.

start.name: Sony
start.description: Supplies high-end camera sensors enabling iPhone features.

end.name: Apple
end.description: Tech company that uses Sony's sensors for iPhone cameras.
